mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.review_rating AS rating, r.review_content AS content, r.review_status AS status, r.member_id AS memberId, r.doctor_id AS doctorId, r.created_datetime AS createdDatetime, r.updated_datetime AS updatedDatetime, m.member_name AS memberName FROM tbl_review r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.member_id = m.id WHERE r.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND r.review_status = 'active' ORDER BY r.created_datetime DESC LIMIT #{criteria.rowCount} OFFSET #{criteria.offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_review r WHERE r.doctor_id = #{doctorId} AND r.review_status = 'active'
